title: windows: need trailing backslash when adding Go bin to %PATH%
body:
by **feedback.test.account**: 
https://feedback.corp.google.com/#/Report/1034250770

Description:
At least on my 64-bit Windows 7 here, the alteration that the Go msi file makes to the
PATH doesn't seem to take effect in subsequently opened console windows unless I go in
and add a \ to the end (i.e. make it end in "C:\Go\bin\" rather than
"C:\Go\bin").  Or, possibly,  until I go in and make just any alteration to
the PATH, or until I hit SAVE in that dialog, or something silly like that.
